/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with balconies and windows, reflecting the architectural style of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the buildings.
